nodes.text: Major Anbow was a male individual who served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

In 0 ABY, Major Anbow was among a group of Imperials that escorted General Sebastian Parnell to the Deathblock, a prison block located on the planet Tol Ado. On arrival at the Deathblock, Parnell ordered Anbow to interrogate the prisoner Erling Tredway, a task that Anbow was very enthusiastic about.
Anbow was created by Troy Denning and appeared in one of the role-playing strands of the 1990 West End Games role-playing supplement Jedi's Honor.
